RelatedSentence: INDIANAPOLIS - The Indiana Court of Appeals says two students hurt in a school shooting can sue the school district over their injuries .
INDIANAPOLIS - The Indiana Court of Appeals says two students hurt in a school shooting can sue the school district over their injuries .

The court ruled Monday a trial must be held to determine whether the Metropolitan School District of Martinsville is liable for the injuries suffered by Chance Jackson , then 15 , and another student in the March 25 , 2011 , shooting at Martinsville West Middle School .

The court ruled Monday a trial must be held to determine whether the Metropolitan School District of Martinsville is liable for the injuries suffered by Chance Jackson , then 15 , and another student in the March 25 , 2011 , shooting at Martinsville West Middle School .
Jackson was hospitalized for several weeks and required multiple surgeries .
The two victims argued the school district knew former student Michael Phelps had threatened Jackson and should have taken more precautions to prevent the attack .
